definition: receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Usually, Knowledge People are more modest.
sentences.chinese: 往往越有知識的人越虛懷若谷。

sentences.english: Great Media people have a modest heart and we modestly learn from our industrial peers.
sentences.chinese: 國瑞人有一顆謙卑之心，虛懷若谷向每位同行學習。

definition: lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
to be content with what one is
to choose what is good and hold fast to it (idiom)
lit. to have accumulated knowledge and deliver it slowly (idiom)/good preparation is the key to success/to be well prepared
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to return to one's true self/to regain the natural state
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
